sentences.en: ‘Look lively, lads, keep in step,’ Charlie shouted.
sentences.cn: “伙计们，精神点儿，跟上，”查理喊道。

sentences.en: "Holidays That Don't Cost the Earth" is a lively, informative read.
sentences.cn: 《绿色环保的假期》是本生动有趣、增长见闻的读物。

sentences.en: a lively and enquiring mind
sentences.cn: 思维活跃、善于探索的头脑

sentences.en: a lively child
sentences.cn: 精力充沛的孩子

sentences.en: a lively combination of colours
sentences.cn: 鲜艳的颜色搭配

sentences.en: A lively conversation went on with everybody joining in.
sentences.cn: 你一言,我一语,谈得很热闹.

sentences.en: a lively Spanish dance
sentences.cn: 轻快活泼的西班牙舞蹈

sentences.en: an intelligent and lively young woman
sentences.cn: 聪慧而充满活力的年轻女士

sentences.en: Autumn is a lively season for the wool market.
sentences.cn: 秋天是毛织品畅销的季节.

sentences.en: He has a lively sense of humour and appears naturally confident.
sentences.cn: 他有一种活泼外向的幽默感，看上去大方自信。

sentences.en: He may be eighty, but he is still lively.
sentences.cn: 他可能已有80岁, 但是仍然充满朝气.

sentences.en: His observations gave rise to an animated and lively discussion.
sentences.cn: 他的言论引起了一场气氛热烈而活跃的讨论.

sentences.en: I looked a bIt'stiff while they were so lively.
sentences.cn: 他们都那样活泼,显得我太板了.

sentences.en: Josephine was bright, lively and cheerful.
sentences.cn: 约瑟芬聪明、活泼、开朗。

sentences.en: The lively dance heightened the joyous atmosphere of the scene.
sentences.cn: 轻快的舞蹈给这场戏渲染了欢乐气氛.

sentences.en: The old man is still vigorous and lively.
sentences.cn: 那老人依然精力充沛.

sentences.en: The sea is quite lively today.
sentences.cn: 今天海面风浪很大.

sentences.en: Their 4-1 win in Honduras was a particularly lively affair.
sentences.cn: 他们在洪都拉斯以4比1获胜的那场比赛尤其激动人心。

sentences.en: This book is sound in content and lively in style.
sentences.cn: 这本书内容好,并且写得很生动.

sentences.en: This lively town is handy for Londoners.
sentences.cn: 这个热闹的小城离伦敦很近。

words.tran_cn: 适于居住的；生活过得有价值的
活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的
肝病的；坏脾气的；似肝的；易怒的
活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的

phrases.tran_cn: 布莱克·莱弗利（美剧演员）
(非正式)动作快点儿，精神点儿

trans.tran_cn: 充满活力的，活泼的，充满趣味的
trans.tran_en: someone who is lively has a lot of energy and is very active
